ProjectTitle: Dissecting the phenotypic landscape of synonymous mutations using large-scale genome editing
InitialFeedbackHistory:
23/05/2024
2. Research Data Summary
We advise to split up the different data types in different rows, to make the summary more clear and understandable.
3. Documentation and Metadata
The question on documentation asks for information on what the documentation will contain, not where it will be stored. 
Please adapt your answer to reflect this. 
5. Data Preservation after the end of the Research Project
Many cloud based storage solutions (e.g. OneDrive) are based on personal accounts that disappear when a researcher leaves KU Leuven. 
Please make sure your data will still be present at the end of your project, if you rely on cloud based services. 
6. Data Sharing and Reuse
Please specify which data will be shared openly, and which will not. 
Also, please specify how the data will be shared, and under what licence.
label: good with suggestions
